Header.title: Education
Header.paragraph: We are bringing overseas education within everyone’s reach
Header.paragraph1: Our Tech-enabled solutions help international students and recruitment partners choose the best global universities

About.paragraph: International Educare Corporation, popularly known as IEC is the specialist in Medical Education Abroad, IEC is established in 2000. Since then IEC is relentlessly serving student community to cherish their dream of Quality Medical Education at an affordable cost.IEC have partnered with many renowned Medical Universities Internationally and always act as a link between the Universities and the students. At IEC we not only nurture good doctors but also doctor with a strong and comprehensive foundation of Medical Knowledge, Skills and Compassion. We train them to be the leaders, to make independent decisions and to collaborate with other medical professionals.6500+ Studying MBBS through US 2500+ IEC Students are working Doctors now.
Why: We are India’s leading overseas educational consultancy.
Our experience in the field has made us expert and authentict
More than 6500 students have successfully counseled and taken admission with the help of Select Your University.
Detailed and expert guidance and verified information.
Why2: We are official partners with the top universities of many countries.
Guaranteed admission and documentation, guidance for all the courses and universities.
Assistance for Visa and passport as well as accommodation abroad.
Mock interview for the students to groom them as per specific requirements4

Services.name: For Students
Services.text: With tailored guidance, our seamless counselling supports your applications, admissions, visas, scholarships, and loans. Guiding you to your dream university.

Services.name: For Partners
Services.text: Partner with our expert team and advanced technology to discover how they can truly transform your business into a lasting success story.
